data.text: Mègadzo nyanyanya le ame vɔ̃ɖiwo ta,
elabena esusɔ vie woayrɔ abe gbe ene,
Ɖo dzi ɖe Yehowa ŋu, eye nàwɔ nyui;
Yehowa ƒe nu nenyo ŋuwò ekema ana nu
Tsɔ wò mɔwo gblẽ ɖe Yehowa ƒe asi me;
Ana wò dzɔdzɔenyenye nàdze abe ŋdikekeli ene,
Zi kpoo le Yehowa ŋkume,
Ɖe asi le dziku ŋu, eye nàtrɔ megbe de wò dɔmedzoe,
Woatsrɔ̃ ame vlowo
Esusɔ vie ko ame vɔ̃ɖi la maganɔ anyi o,
Ke ame fafawo anyi anyigba la ƒe dome,
Ame vɔ̃ɖiwo ɖo nugbe ɖe
Ke Aƒetɔ la le ame vɔ̃ɖiwo kom,
Ame vɔ̃ɖiwo ɖe woƒe yi,
Gake woƒe yiwo aŋɔ woawo ŋutɔ ƒe dziwo,
Nu ʋɛ si le ame dzɔdzɔewo si la nyo wu
elabena woaŋe ame vɔ̃ɖiwo ƒe ŋusẽ,
Ame siwo ŋuti fɔɖiɖi mele o la
Le ŋkeke vɔ̃wo dzi la, womalũ xɛ o;
Ke ame vɔ̃ɖi ya atsrɔ̃.
Ame vɔ̃ɖi doa nugbana, eye mexea fea o,
Ame siwo Yehowa yra la anyi anyigba la ƒe dome,
Ŋutsu si ƒe mɔwo dze Yehowa ŋu la,
ne ekli nu hã la, madze anyi o
Tsã la, menye ɖevi, ke azɔ la metsi,
Woawo boŋ vea ame nu ɣe sia ɣi,
Tsri nu vɔ̃ɖi, eye nàwɔ nyui
Elabena Yehowa lɔ̃a nu dzɔdzɔe wɔlawo,
Ame dzɔdzɔe anyi anyigba la ƒe dome,
Nunyanya doa go tso ame dzɔdzɔe ƒe nu me,
Eƒe Mawu ƒe se le eƒe dzi me,
Ame vɔ̃ɖiwo de xa ɖi na ame dzɔdzɔewo,
gake Yehowa matsɔ wo agblẽ ɖe woƒe ŋusẽ te,
Lala nàkpɔ Yehowa ƒe asinu,
Mekpɔ ame vɔ̃ɖi,
Gake eteƒe medidi o ko, enu va yi, eye megali o;
Bu ame maɖifɔ la ŋu,
Ke woatsrɔ̃ nu vɔ̃ wɔlawo katã,
Ame dzɔdzɔewo ƒe xɔxɔ atso Yehowa gbɔ,
Ke Yehowa kpena ɖe wo ŋu, eye wòɖea wo tso dzɔgbevɔ̃e me;
